Class Cartographer

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    A map generator for RogueFrame

    Ryan Luchs

        public static void addEntities(short id,
               int level,
               int min,
               int max,
               TileMap map,
               java.util.ArrayList<AbstractEntity> ents)
        Adds a number of AbstractEntities of a specific ID to a given ArrayList
        Parameters:
        id - The ID number of the AbstractEntities to add
        level - The level of theAbstractEntities
        min - The minimum number of AbstractEntities
        max - The maximum number of AbstractEntities
        map - The map these AbstractEntities will exist in
        ents - The ArrayList to add these AbstractEntities to
